r:Title.r:String: Definition for a DDI (3.2) master profile for a QuestionItem

r:Purpose.r:Content: Resource package containing a master DDI profile for QuestionItem

r:Description.r:Content: This is a master DDI profile for the DASISH Questionnaire Design and Documentation Tool(QDDT) v1.0 for the element QuestionItem. The profile includes specified elements for QuestionItem and its referenced elements

r:Purpose.r:Content: The purpose of the master profile is for developers to look at, and could also be used to check the toolâ€™s compliance with the profile

pr:Instructions.r:Content: Constraints of the DDI 3.2 specification apply, including which elements are required. Requirements by the profile remains to be added.
Indicates the language of the content. Use IETF locale language codes.
This will not be implemented in the preliminary version of the tool.

Contains the basic components of individual survey questions. Important features for the question as in the instrument, like the question number, interviewer or respondent instructions or External aid is added in QuestionConstruct.
For publication status keys. This will not be implemented in the preliminary version of the tool.
For the preliminary version of the QDDT the only combination of domains in StucturedMixedResponseDomain is that of a valid domain and a missing code representation.
Contains only MissingCodeRepresentation for the preliminary version of the QDDT
For publication status keys. This will not be implemented in the preliminary version of the tool.
